welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chino! Get ready to experience the charming, small-town atmosphere and beautiful scenery that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chino has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a gift shop, restaurant, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field
terminals.description: Daugherty Field is the general aviation terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
